attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the Government to consider reinstating the Death Penalty for crimes such as the murder of Garry Newlove. It is obvious that in this instance a life sentence is not sufficient and I would state that the vast majority of the public would agree that this case has proven a need for the Death Penalty to be reinstated for extreme circumstances such as this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
